items.content_html: This Duplicate Lines Finder is a lightweight web application designed to help you identify and remove duplicate lines from blocks of text. Whether you're working with large datasets, coding scripts, or simply organizing information, this tool simplifies the process by quickly detecting duplicates and presenting you with the cleaned text.
items.title: Nateer-ed/Duplicate-Lines-Finder: This Duplicate Lines Finder is a lightweight web application designed to help you identify and remove duplicate lines from blocks of text. Whether you're working with large datasets, coding scripts, or simply organizing information, this tool simplifies the process by quickly detecting duplicates and presenting you with the cleaned text.
